transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, yes sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir Durgesh bol raha hu sir India Mart head office se.
(music) Sorry call hold ki ti gayi hai. Kripa karke line pe bane raho. Aapka call hold par hai. Line par bane rahe ya kuch der baad koshish kare. Your call has been put on hold. Please stay on the line. Sorry call hold ki ti gayi hai. Kripa karke line pe bane raho. Aapka call hold par hai. Line par bane rahe ya kuch der baad koshish kare. Your call has been put on hold. Please stay on the line. Sorry call hold ki ti gayi hai. Kripa karke line pe bane raho. Aapka call
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji bolye.
Executive: Ha yes sir mai Durgesh bol raha hu India Mart head office se. Aapka account mai sir. Ha sir abhi aapne aapka bhi ticket raise tha sir kya issues hai zara bataiye please.
Customer: Kon Durgesh bol rahe ho?
Executive: Ha sir Durgesh bol raha hu.
Customer: Yaar abhi hamara jo hai hame jo hai hamara discussion hua tha bhai hame business leads milengi hame koi leads weeds nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir mai ha okay yes sir. Kya issues aa rahe hai sir mujhe bataiye. aa rahi hai wo mostly Punjab area se aa rahi hai.
Customer: Punjab area se aa rahe hai sir. Okay. Sir mai actually abhi aapka dekh mai dekh pa raha hu sir abhi WPC door frame mein aapne prefer leader liya hai aur WP board mein aapne prefer leader liya hai lekin abhi aapne bola hai ki sirf aur sirf Punjab ke city se aa rahi hai inquiries but mai yaha pe sir mai dekh pa raha hu sir aapka har jagah se inquiries aa rahi hai bas just please wait mai ek baar aapko dikhata hu batata hu sir.
Customer: Inquiries aa rahi hai yaar lekin hame business inquiries nahi aa rahi hai business inquiries bahut kam hai 2 lakh rupees dene ke baad bhi hame inquiries bahut kam quantity ki aa rahi hai wo hamare kisi kaam ki nahi hai.
Executive: Okay sir nahi hai abhi aapne matlab mai mai check kar lunga koi dikkat nahi hai sir lekin aapne abhi bola na ki sirf mujhe Punjab ke city se aa rahi hai inquiries lekin mai aapko bata deta hu sir ki aapki jo jo inquiries jo hai wo aap Hyderabad abhi Hyderabad Visakhapatnam Vijayawada Delhi Guntur Kanpur Gurugram aap hame koi mail kar sakte hai kuch.
Customer: Ha aap hame koi mail kar sakte hai kuch?
Executive: Ha ha mai aapke number pe aapko screenshot kyuki abhi jo aapke paas inquiries iska jo jo all inquiries aa rahi hai monthly wo aapki aa rahi hai 325 on average bata raha hu aapko June mein aapka aaya tha 339 leads aayi thi aur July mein aapka 325 leads aayi thi August mein aapki aayi thi 341 leads aayi thi total inquiries ki baat kar raha hu aur September mein aapka 350 inquiries total aayi thi aur October mein aapka 330 inquiries aayi thi aur November mein right now 225 inquiries aayi thi right. To ye hai aapka pure 6 mahine ka data jo maine aapko bataya sir ye inquiries all inquiries ki baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Aapke paas call bhi mai aapko dikha sakta hu. report hum bhi nikal sakte hai ye report hum bhi nikal sakte hai na India Mart se.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Hum report dekh sakte hai India Mart pe.
Executive: Ha ha bilkul aap bilkul report dekh sakte hai sir aap mai aapko batata hu aap waha pe dekh lijiye aap lead manager mein open karna.
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Lead manager pe click karna sir.
Customer: Accha abhi thoda time lagega yaar mai usko bolta hu sir lead manager pe jaunga aapko call bhi dobara aapko. Ha mai aapko mai. Ha mera number sir 7488758280 hai sir. Lead manager ho gaya lead manager pe maine click kar liya lekin ye mai aapko batata hu sir kaise mai aapko batata hu kaise karna hai lead manager pe click karne ke baad sir left side mein aapka three dot aa raha hoga sir three line ka ek aa raha hoga symbol aa raha hoga us pe aapko click karna hai and then go to support and information. Thik hai sir and fir uske baad jaise hi aap open karenge na uske baad all alerts pe aa jayega help help videos aa jayegi and then performance report uske baad click karne ke baad sir aapko information aapko mil jayega yaha pe do tab hai ek hai monthly ek hai weekly aapko monthly pe click karke sir aapka kitni inquiries aa rahi hai month ka wo sare cheeze aapko yaha pe information aapko mil jayega plus aapki by kitna daily basis pe use ho rahi hai monthly kitni use ho rahi hai wo bhi aapko yaha pe show kar jayega plus direct calls ka bhi yaha pe scenario jo hai na wo aapka dikh jayega sir lekin aisa nahi hai ki sirf aur sirf Punjab ke city se inquiries aa rahi hai sab jagah se inquiries aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Mai ek baar check karta hu dobara se fir mai aapko call karta hu aapke number pe.
Executive: Ha sir aap ek baar ek baar check karke mujhe please inform kijiye sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
(music) Sorry call hold ki ti gayi hai. Kripa karke
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business leads.

- Most inquiries are from Punjab area only.

- Inquiries are of low quantity.



Resolution:

- Executive provided data of inquiries from different cities.

- Executive explained how to check report in lead manager.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check again and inform the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, lead manager, report
